name: Devil's Food Brownie Cake
author: Yoly
summary: This cake is truly decadent and made with only 5 ingredients. It is chocolaty, rich, moist, and absolutely delicious. I top it off with an easy 2-ingredient ganache but feel free to top it off with a sprinkle of powdered sugar, ice cream, whipped cream, or hot fudge.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a fluted tube pan (such as Bundt®) with nonstick spray
Combine brownie mix, cake mix, cold coffee, oil, and eggs in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until well combined
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 50 to 60 minutes
Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes
Run a table knife around the edges to loosen
Invert carefully onto a serving plate or cooling rack
Heat whipping cream for ganache in the microwave until hot, 2 to 3 minutes
Add chocolate chips and stir until melted
Pour ganache over the cooled cake
